Package game

Class ZombieLimb

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.ZombieLimb
  • public class ZombieLimb
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to keep track the amount of legs and hand a zombie has left It is automatically initialized in every zombie object This class also contain method to cast off a zombie limb when damage is received and movement control for the zombie if a zombie has broken leg
    Author:
    Teh Qi Yuan

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ZombieLimb()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canMove()
      Method that determine whether a zombie are allowed to move this turn
      java.lang.String castLimb​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      Method to determine whether a zombie limb will be cast off based on the probability calculated in willFall() If zombie loses one hand, it will have 50% chance of dropping weapon If zombie loses both hand, it must drop the weapon
      int hand()
      Setter to retrieve the number of hand left for this zombie

      • hand

        public int hand()
        Setter to retrieve the number of hand left for this zombie
        Returns:
        The number of hand left

      • castLimb

        public java.lang.String castLimb​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                 edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
        Method to determine whether a zombie limb will be cast off based on the probability calculated in willFall() If zombie loses one hand, it will have 50% chance of dropping weapon If zombie loses both hand, it must drop the weapon
        Parameters:
        actor - The zombie that will cast of the limb
        map - The map where the zombie is placed
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        Returns:
        string String representation as of whether a limb will be casted off

      • canMove

        public boolean canMove()
        Method that determine whether a zombie are allowed to move this turn
        Returns:
        true if zombie can move this turn and false otherwise
